name: EnglishClearspeakAbsoluteValue

Abs01.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xml:lang="en"><prosody rate="100%"> <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="3"/> the absolute value of <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">x</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>
